> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "And we, you and me"hissed Hydras while he took kindly her

> 
> A bit unexpected.. but he changed her mood.. from that of totaly 
seriousness &
>  grave outlook upon the future... to something that was lifting. 
> 
> "Indeed. Survival .. of the fittest? As they always say," she 
purred.
